generated_sentence: an user has a communication preference
actual_sentence: When a user enters the banking system user should see a menu that allows the user to select communication preferences.
Customer Users should be able to choose if they want to get information via e-mail or SMS.

actual_sentence: If the user has not any e-mail address registered to the banking system, the e-mail option should see as 'disabled', and by default, the SMS option is selected.
